title: Atoms, hyperplanes, and covering in a left vector space (or module)

blocks.name: clsa
blocks.content: Extend class notation with all 1-dim subspaces (atoms) of a left module or left vector space.
blocks.origin: const class clsa { LSAtoms }

blocks.name: diff.clsa.s
diff.clsa.c
diff.clsa.w
clsh
blocks.content: Extend class notation with all subspaces of a left module or left vector space that are hyperplanes.
blocks.origin: const class clsh { LSHyp }

blocks.name: diff.clsh.s
diff.clsh.c
diff.clsh.w
df-lsatoms
blocks.content: Define the set of all 1-dim subspaces (atoms) of a left module or left vector space. (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: df-lshyp
blocks.content: Define the set of all hyperplanes of a left module or left vector space. Also called co-atoms, these are subspaces that are one dimension less that the full space. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: lshpset
blocks.content: The set of all hyperplanes of a left module or left vector space. The vector ` v ` is called a generating vector for the hyperplane. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lshpset(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, crab(s0, c3, wa(wne(cv(s0), c4), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), c4))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clspn, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clsh, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, crab(s0, c3, wa(wne(cv(s0), c4), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), c4)))))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  syl5eq(c2, crab(s0, c3, wa(wne(cv(s0), c4), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), c4)))), cfv(clsh, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(clsh, c0), crab(s0, c3, wa(wne(cv(s0), c4), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), c4))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, clsh, crab(s0, c3, wa(wne(cv(s0), c4), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), c4)))), crab(s0, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), wa(wne(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wrex(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, cv(hs0)), cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))))
  rabeqbidv(s0, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wne(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wrex(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, cv(hs0)), cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))), wa(wne(cv(s0), c4), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), c4))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(clss, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, clss)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wrex(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, cv(hs0)), cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wne(cv(s0), c4), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), c4)))
  neeq2d(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rexeqbidv(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, cv(hs0)), cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c5, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), c4))
  eqeq12d(cfv(cfv(clspn, cv(hs0)), cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(c5, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1d(cfv(clspn, cv(hs0)), cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))), c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(clspn, cv(hs0)), c5, cfv(clspn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, clspn)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  df-lshyp(hs0, s0, s1)
  rabex(s0, c3, wa(wne(cv(s0), c4), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), c4))))
  fvexi(c3, clss, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, c3, wa(wne(cv(s0), c4), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), c4)))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, clss, cv(hs0))
  diff.clss.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm lshpset(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 = { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ‚â† c4 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))= c4))})
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(LSpan ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSHyp ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 = { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ‚â† c4 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))= c4))}), d(s1, c4))
  syl5eq(c2, { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ‚â† c4 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))= c4))}, (LSHyp ` c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (LSHyp ` c0)= { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ‚â† c4 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))= c4))}, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, clsh, { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ‚â† c4 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))= c4))}, { s0 ‚àà(LSubSp ` hs0)|(s0 ‚â†(Base ` hs0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0),((LSpan ` hs0)`(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))=(Base ` hs0)))})
  rabeqbidv(s0, (LSubSp ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0, (s0 ‚â†(Base ` hs0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0),((LSpan ` hs0)`(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))=(Base ` hs0))), (s0 ‚â† c4 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))= c4)))
  syl6eqr((LSubSp ` hs0), c3, (LSubSp ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, clss)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, s0 ‚â†(Base ` hs0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0),((LSpan ` hs0)`(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))=(Base ` hs0)), s0 ‚â† c4, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))= c4))
  neeq2d(s0, (Base ` hs0), c4, hs0 = c0)
  rexeqbidv(s1, (Base ` hs0), c4, hs0 = c0, ((LSpan ` hs0)`(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))=(Base ` hs0), (c5 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))= c4)
  eqeq12d(((LSpan ` hs0)`(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 })), (Base ` hs0), (c5 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 })), c4, hs0 = c0)
  fveq1d((LSpan ` hs0), (s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }), c5, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((LSpan ` hs0), c5, (LSpan ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, clspn)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c4, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  df-lshyp(hs0, s0, s1)
  rabex(s0, c3, (s0 ‚â† c4 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))= c4)))
  fvexi(c3, clss, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ‚â† c4 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))= c4))})
  diff.cfv.s(s0, clss, hs0)
  diff.clss.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: islshp
blocks.content: The predicate "is a hyperplane" (of a left module or left vector space). (Contributed by NM, 29-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm islshp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, c3), w3a(wcel(c2, c4), wne(c2, c5), wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(c6, cun(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), c5)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clspn, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clsh, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), w3a(wcel(c2, c4), wne(c2, c5), wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(c6, cun(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), c5))), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, c4, wa(wne(cv(hs0), c5), wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(c6, cun(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), c5))))))
  eleq2d(c2, c3, crab(hs0, c4, wa(wne(cv(hs0), c5), wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(c6, cun(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), c5)))), wcel(c0, c1))
  lshpset(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  bitr4i(wcel(c2, crab(hs0, c4, wa(wne(cv(hs0), c5), wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(c6, cun(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), c5))))), w3a(wcel(c2, c4), wne(c2, c5), wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(c6, cun(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), c5))), wa(wcel(c2, c4), wa(wne(c2, c5), wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(c6, cun(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), c5)))))
  elrab(hs0, c2, c4, wa(wne(cv(hs0), c5), wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(c6, cun(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), c5))), wa(wne(c2, c5), wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(c6, cun(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), c5))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wne(cv(hs0), c5), wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(c6, cun(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), c5)), wne(c2, c5), wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(c6, cun(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), c5)))
  neeq1(cv(hs0), c2, c5)
  rexbidv(s0, c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cfv(c6, cun(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), c5), wceq(cfv(c6, cun(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), c5))
  fveqeq2d(c6, cun(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), c5, cun(c2, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  uneq1(cv(hs0), c2, csn(cv(s0)))
  3anass(wcel(c2, c4), wne(c2, c5), wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(c6, cun(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), c5)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wne(c2, c5), wrex(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(c6, cun(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), c5))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm islshp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚Üî(c2 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c5 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5))))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(LSpan ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(LSHyp ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  syl6bb(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c2 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c5 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5)), c2 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà c4 |(hs0 ‚â† c5 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(hs0 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5))})
  eleq2d(c2, c3, { hs0 ‚àà c4 |(hs0 ‚â† c5 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(hs0 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5))}, c0 ‚àà c1)
  lshpset(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  bitr4i(c2 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà c4 |(hs0 ‚â† c5 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(hs0 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5))}, (c2 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c5 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5)), (c2 ‚àà c4 ‚àß(c2 ‚â† c5 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5))))
  elrab(hs0, c2, c4, (hs0 ‚â† c5 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(hs0 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5)), (c2 ‚â† c5 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, hs0 ‚â† c5, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(hs0 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5), c2 ‚â† c5, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5))
  neeq1(hs0, c2, c5)
  rexbidv(s0, c5, hs0 = c2, (c6 `(hs0 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5, (c6 `(c2 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5)
  fveqeq2d(c6, (hs0 ‚ãÉ { s0 }), c5, (c2 ‚ãÉ { s0 }), hs0 = c2)
  uneq1(hs0, c2, { s0 })
  3anass(c2 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚â† c5, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ‚â† c5 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ‚ãÉ { s0 }))= c5)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: islshpsm
blocks.content: Hyperplane properties expressed with subspace sum. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm islshpsm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(c0, c4, cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), c3)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clspn, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsm, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clsh, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, clmod))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(c0, c4, cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), c3))), w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), c3))))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), c3)))), wcel(c6, clmod))
  islshp(s0, c6, clmod, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  3bitr4g(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), c3))), w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(c0, c4, cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3)), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3)), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(c0, c4, cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), c3))))
  bicomd(w0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3)), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3)), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(c0, c4, cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), c3))))
  pm5.32da(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3)), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(c0, c4, cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), c3)), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(c5, cun(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), c3)))
  rexbidva(s0, c3, wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3))), wceq(co(c0, c4, cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), c3), wceq(cfv(c5, cun(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), c3))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, c4, cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), c3, cfv(c5, cun(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3))), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  3eqtr4rd(co(c0, c4, cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(c5, cun(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(c5, cun(cfv(c5, c0), cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0))))), cfv(c5, cun(c0, cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0))))), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3))), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  fveq2d(c5, cun(cfv(c5, c0), cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), cun(c0, cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3))), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  uneq1d(cfv(c5, c0), cfv(c5, csn(cv(s0))), c0, wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3))), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))

blocks.name: lshplss
blocks.content: A hyperplane is a subspace. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lshplss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clss, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clsh, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
} = {
  simp1d(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)), wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c2), cun(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)), wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c2), cun(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c2)))), wcel(c0, c3))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)), wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c2), cun(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c2))))), wcel(c2, clmod))
  islshp(hs0, c2, clmod, c0, c3, c1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(clspn, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c2))
}

blocks.name: lshpne
blocks.content: A hyperplane is not equal to the vector space. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: lshpnel
blocks.content: A hyperplane's generating vector does not belong to the hyperplane. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lshpnel(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

} = {
  mpd(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wne(c1, c2))
  lshpne(c1, c2, c3, c6, w0)
  necon3ad(c1, c2, w0, wcel(c0, c1))

  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(co(c1, c5, cfv(c4, csn(c0))), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c3)), wcel(cfv(c4, csn(c0)), cfv(csubg, c3)), wss(cfv(c4, csn(c0)), c1))
  sseldd(c1, cfv(csubg, c3), cfv(clss, c3), wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  sseldd(cfv(c4, csn(c0)), cfv(csubg, c3), cfv(clss, c3), wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wss(cfv(clss, c3), cfv(csubg, c3)), wcel(c3, clmod))
  lsssssubg(c3, cfv(clss, c3))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cfv(c4, csn(c0)), cfv(clss, c3)), wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c0, c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))
  lspsncl(c3, c0, c2, c4, cfv(clss, c3))
  lspsnel5a(c4, c0, c1, cfv(clss, c3), c3, wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))

  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(clss, c3)))

  eqid(cfv(clss, c3))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  lsmss2(c1, c3, cfv(c4, csn(c0)), c5)
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c1, c5, cfv(c4, csn(c0))), c2))

thm lshpnel(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSpan ` c3)

blocks.name: lshpnelb
blocks.content: The subspace sum of a hyperplane and the span of an element equals the vector space iff the element is not in the hyperplane. (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lshpnelb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c0))), c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clspn, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clsm, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clsh, c5))

  eqtrd(co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c0))), c4, co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(cv(hs0)))), w3a(wa(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(cv(hs0)))), c4)))
  syl211anc(w3a(wa(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(cv(hs0)))), c4)), wceq(co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c0))), co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(cv(hs0))))), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wpss(c1, co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c0)))), wss(co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c0))), co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(cv(hs0))))))

  lsmub1(c1, c5, cfv(c3, csn(c0)), c2)
  necomd(c1, co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c0))), wa(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c1))))

  sseldd(c0, co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c0))), cfv(c3, csn(c0)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(cfv(c3, csn(c0)), co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c0)))), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c0)), cfv(csubg, c5)))

  adantlr(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(cv(hs0)))), c4), wss(co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c0))), co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(cv(hs0))))))
  sseqtr4d(co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c0))), co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(cv(hs0)))), c4, wa(w0, wceq(co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(cv(hs0)))), c4)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(cv(hs0)))), c4), wss(co(c1, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c0))), c4))

thm lshpnelb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))= c4))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(LSpan ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSSum ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(LSHyp ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  impbida(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))= c4)
  mpd((w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1), (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))= c4, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4))
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4))
  simp3d(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4), c1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c5), c1 ‚â† c4)
  mpbid(w0, (c1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c5)‚àß c1 ‚â† c4 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c4,(c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4)), c1 ‚àà c6)
  islshpsm(hs0, c1, c6, (LSubSp ` c5), c4, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  rexlimdv3a(hs0, c4, (w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1), (c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))= c4)
  eqtrd((c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })), c4, (c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 })), ((w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß(c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4))
  syl211anc(((w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß(c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4), (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))=(c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 })), w0, hs0 ‚àà c4, c1 ‚ää(c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })), (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))‚äÜ(c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 })))
  simp1l(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c4, (c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4)
  simp2((w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1), hs0 ‚àà c4, (c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4)
  3ad2ant1((w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1), hs0 ‚àà c4, (c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4, c1 ‚ää(c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })))
  sylanbrc((w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1), c1 ‚ää(c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })), c1 ‚äÜ(c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })), c1 ‚â†(c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })))
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1, c1 ‚äÜ(c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })))
  syl2anc(w0, c1 ‚äÜ(c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })), c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), (c3 ` { c0 })‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  lsmub1(c1, c5, (c3 ` { c0 }), c2)
  necomd(c1, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })), (w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1))
  sylan(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))‚â† c1, c0 ‚àà(c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })))
  sseldd(c0, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })), (c3 ` { c0 }), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c3 ` { c0 })‚äÜ(c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })), c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), (c3 ` { c0 })‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  sseldd(c1, (SubGrp ` c5), (LSubSp ` c5), w0)
  sseldd((c3 ` { c0 }), (SubGrp ` c5), (LSubSp ` c5), w0)
  syl(w0, (LSubSp ` c5)‚äÜ(SubGrp ` c5), c5 ‚àà LMod)
  lsssssubg(c5, (LSubSp ` c5))
  lsmub2(c1, c5, (c3 ` { c0 }), c2)
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ‚àà(c3 ` { c0 }), c5 ‚àà LMod, c0 ‚àà c4)
  lspsnid(c5, c0, c4, c3)
  nelne1(c0, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })), c1)
  df-pss(c1, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })))
  3adant2((w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1), hs0 ‚àà c4, (c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))‚äÜ(c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 })))
  adantlr(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1, (c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))‚äÜ(c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 })))
  sseqtr4d((c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })), (c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 })), c4, (w0 ‚àß(c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4))
  adantr(w0, (c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))‚äÜ c4)
  syl(w0, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))‚äÜ c4, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))‚àà(LSubSp ` c5))
  lssss((c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })), (LSubSp ` c5), c4, c5)
  simpr(w0, (c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4)
  lsmcv(c1, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 })), c2, c3, hs0, c4, c5, (LSubSp ` c5), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà LVec)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c4, c1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c5))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c4, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))‚àà(LSubSp ` c5))
  syl3anc(w0, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))‚àà(LSubSp ` c5), c5 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c5), (c3 ` { c0 })‚àà(LSubSp ` c5))
  lshplss(c1, (LSubSp ` c5), c5, c6, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c3 ` { c0 })‚àà(LSubSp ` c5), c5 ‚àà LMod, c0 ‚àà c4)
  lspsncl(c5, c0, c4, c3, (LSubSp ` c5))
  lsmcl(c5, c1, (LSubSp ` c5), (c3 ` { c0 }), c2)
  eqid((LSubSp ` c5))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c4)
  simp3((w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1), hs0 ‚àà c4, (c1[c2](c3 ` { hs0 }))= c4)
  lshpnel(c0, c1, c4, c5, c3, c2, c6, (w0 ‚àß(c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))= c4))
  adantr(w0, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))= c4, c5 ‚àà LMod)
  syl(w0, c5 ‚àà LMod, c5 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c5)
  adantr(w0, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))= c4, c1 ‚àà c6)
  adantr(w0, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))= c4, c0 ‚àà c4)
  simpr(w0, (c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))= c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((LSubSp ` c5))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c1))
  diff.hs0.w((c1[c2](c3 ` { c0 }))= c4)
}

thm lshpnel2N(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c4))), c5)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clss, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clspn, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clsm, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clsh, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c4, c0)))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c4))), c5))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(co(c0, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c4))), c5), wn(wcel(c4, c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c4, c0)))
  lshpnelb(c4, c0, c2, c3, c5, c6, c1, wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c6, clvec))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, c5))
  mpbir3and(wa(w0, wceq(co(c0, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c4))), c5)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c7), wne(c0, c5), wrex(hs0, c5, wceq(cfv(c3, cun(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), c5)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(c0, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c4))), c5), wcel(c0, c7))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(c0, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c4))), c5), wne(c0, c5))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wceq(co(c0, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c4))), c5)), wrex(hs0, c5, wceq(cfv(c3, cun(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), c5)), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cfv(c3, cun(c0, csn(c4))), c5))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(c0, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c4))), c5), wcel(c4, c5))
  biimpa(w0, wceq(co(c0, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c4))), c5), wceq(cfv(c3, cun(c0, csn(c4))), c5))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c4))), c5, cfv(c3, cun(c0, csn(c4))), w0)
  3eqtr4rd(co(c0, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c4))), cfv(c3, cun(c0, csn(c4))), cfv(c3, cun(cfv(c3, c0), cfv(c3, csn(c4)))), cfv(c3, cun(c0, cfv(c3, csn(c4)))), w0)
  fveq2d(c3, cun(cfv(c3, c0), cfv(c3, csn(c4))), cun(c0, cfv(c3, csn(c4))), w0)
  uneq1d(cfv(c3, c0), cfv(c3, csn(c4)), c0, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c3, c0), c0), wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(c0, c7))
  lspid(c6, c0, c7, c3)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c3, cun(c0, csn(c4))), cfv(c3, cun(cfv(c3, c0), cfv(c3, csn(c4))))), wcel(c6, clmod), wss(c0, c5), wss(csn(c4), c5))
  syl(w0, wss(c0, c5), wcel(c0, c7))
  lssss(c0, c7, c5, c6)
  snssd(c4, c5, w0)
  lspun(c6, c0, c5, csn(c4), c3)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c2, cfv(c3, csn(c4))), cfv(c3, cun(c0, cfv(c3, csn(c4))))), wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(c0, c7), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c4)), c7))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c4)), c7), wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(c4, c5))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(c6, clvec))

blocks.name: lshpcmp
blocks.content: If two hyperplanes are comparable, they are equal. (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2014.)

thm lshpcmp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wss(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c1)))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
} = {
  impbid1(w0, wss(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl5com(w0, wss(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c1), wn(wpss(c0, c1)))
  mpd(w0, wn(wpss(c0, c1)), wne(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)))

  necon3ad(c1, cfv(cbs, c3), w0, wpss(c0, c1))
  mpid(w0, wpss(c0, c1), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  syl(w0, wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c1, cfv(clss, c3)))

  simp3d(w0, wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, c3), wceq(co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c3))), wcel(c0, cfv(clss, c3)), wne(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(clss, c3)), wne(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)), wrex(hs0, cfv(cbs, c3), wceq(co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c3)))), wcel(c0, c2))
  islshpsm(hs0, c0, c2, cfv(clss, c3), cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(clspn, c3), c3, w0)
  rexlimdv(hs0, cfv(cbs, c3), w0, wceq(co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c3)), wi(wpss(c0, c1), wi(wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)))))
  exp42(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c3)), wpss(c0, c1), wi(wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))))
  3imtr3d(wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c3)))), wpss(c0, c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wss(c1, co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0))))), wceq(c1, co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0))))))
  3expia(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c3)))), wpss(c0, c1), wss(c1, co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0))))), wceq(c1, co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0))))))
  syl3an1(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c3)))), wpss(c0, c1), wss(c1, co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0))))), wceq(c1, co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0))))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3))))

  id(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3))))

  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c3))
  eqid(cfv(clsm, c3))

  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(clss, c3)))

  eqid(cfv(clss, c3))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c3, clvec))
  lveclmod(c3)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)))
  sseq2d(c1, co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c3), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c3)))), wpss(c0, c1)))
  eqeq2d(c1, co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c3), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c3)))), wpss(c0, c1)))
  simplrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(clsm, c3), cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cbs, c3)), wpss(c0, c1))
  necon1bd(c0, c1, wss(c0, c1), wpss(c0, c1))
  simplbi2(wss(c0, c1), wne(c0, c1), wpss(c0, c1))
  df-pss(c0, c1)
  eqimss(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(clss, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wpss(c0, c1), wi(wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)))))

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üî c0 = c1))

} = {
  impbid1(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 = c1)
  syl5com(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 = c1, ¬¨ c0 ‚ää c1)
  mpd(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚ää c1, c1 ‚â†(Base ` c3))
  lshpne(c1, (Base ` c3), c3, c2, w0)
  necon3ad(c1, (Base ` c3), w0, c0 ‚ää c1)
  mpid(w0, c0 ‚ää c1, c1 =(Base ` c3), c1 ‚äÜ(Base ` c3))
  syl(w0, c1 ‚äÜ(Base ` c3), c1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c3))
  lssss(c1, (LSubSp ` c3), (Base ` c3), c3)
  mpd(w0, (c0 ‚ää c1 ‚Üí(c1 ‚äÜ(Base ` c3)‚Üí c1 =(Base ` c3))), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3),(c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))=(Base ` c3)))
  simp3d(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3),(c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))=(Base ` c3)), c0 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c3), c0 ‚â†(Base ` c3))
  mpbid(w0, (c0 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c3)‚àß c0 ‚â†(Base ` c3)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3),(c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))=(Base ` c3))), c0 ‚àà c2)
  islshpsm(hs0, c0, c2, (LSubSp ` c3), (Base ` c3), (LSSum ` c3), (LSpan ` c3), c3, w0)
  rexlimdv(hs0, (Base ` c3), w0, (c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))=(Base ` c3), (c0 ‚ää c1 ‚Üí(c1 ‚äÜ(Base ` c3)‚Üí c1 =(Base ` c3))))
  exp42(w0, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3), (c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))=(Base ` c3), c0 ‚ää c1, (c1 ‚äÜ(Base ` c3)‚Üí c1 =(Base ` c3)))
  3imtr3d(((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß(c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))=(Base ` c3)))‚àß c0 ‚ää c1), c1 ‚äÜ(Base ` c3), c1 =(Base ` c3), c1 ‚äÜ(c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 })), c1 =(c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 })))
  3expia((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß(c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))=(Base ` c3))), c0 ‚ää c1, c1 ‚äÜ(c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 })), c1 =(c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 })))
  syl3an1((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß(c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))=(Base ` c3))), c0 ‚ää c1, c1 ‚äÜ(c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 })), c1 =(c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 })), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)))
  adantrr(w0, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3), (c0[(LSSum ` c3)]((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))=(Base ` c3), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)))
  id((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)))
  lsmcv(c0, c1, (LSSum ` c3), (LSpan ` c3), hs0, (Base ` c3), c3, (LSubSp ` c3), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)))

blocks.name: lshpinN
blocks.content: The intersection of two different hyperplanes is not a hyperplane. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm lshpinN(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cin(c0, c1), c2), wceq(c0, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clsh, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
} = {
  impbid(w0, wcel(cin(c0, c1), c2), wceq(c0, c1))
  ex(w0, wcel(cin(c0, c1), c2), wceq(c0, c1))
  eqtr3d(c0, c1, cin(c0, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cin(c0, c1), c2)))
  mpbii(wa(w0, wcel(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0), wss(cin(c0, c1), c0))
  inss1(c0, c1)
  lshpcmp(cin(c0, c1), c0, c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cin(c0, c1), c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cin(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c0, c2))
  mpbii(wa(w0, wcel(cin(c0, c1), c2)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c1), wss(cin(c0, c1), c1))
  inss2(c0, c1)
  lshpcmp(cin(c0, c1), c1, c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cin(c0, c1), c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cin(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c3, clvec))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cin(c0, c1), c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cin(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  syl5ibcom(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cin(c0, c1), c2), wcel(cin(c0, c0), c2))
  syl5eqel(cin(c0, c0), c2, c0, w0)
  inidm(c0)
  eleq1d(cin(c0, c0), c2, cin(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  ineq2(c0, c1, c0)
}

thm lshpinN(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚àà c2 ‚Üî c0 = c1))

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2)

  impbid(w0, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚àà c2, c0 = c1)
  ex(w0, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚àà c2, c0 = c1)

  inss2(c0, c1)
  lshpcmp((c0 ‚ãÇ c1), c1, c2, c3, (w0 ‚àß(c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚àà c2))
  adantr(w0, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà LVec)
  simpr(w0, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚àà c2)

thm lsatspn0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

} = {
  impbida(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), c2), wne(c1, c3))
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), c2)), wne(c1, c3), wne(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), csn(c3)))

  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), c2)), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), cfv(c0, csn(c3))))
  fveq2d(c0, csn(c1), csn(c3), wceq(c1, c3))
  sneq(c1, c3)

  simpr(w0, wne(c1, c3))
  eldifsn(c1, c4, c3)
}

  ex((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c3))), c0 ‚äÜ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }), c0 =((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))
  mpd(((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c3)))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 })), c0 =((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }), c0 ‚â† {(0 ` c3)})
  ad2antrr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c3)), c0 ‚äÜ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }), c0 ‚â† {(0 ` c3)})
  lsatn0(c0, (0 ` c3), c3, c2, w0)
  necon1ad(c0, {(0 ` c3)}, ((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c3)))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 })), c0 =((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))
  ord(((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c3)))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 })), c0 =((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }), c0 = {(0 ` c3)})
  syl31anc(((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c3)))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 })), (c0 =((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 })‚à® c0 = {(0 ` c3)}), c3 ‚àà LVec, c0 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c3), hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3), c0 ‚äÜ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))
  ad2antrr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c3)), c0 ‚äÜ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }), c3 ‚àà LVec)
  ad2antrr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c3)), c0 ‚äÜ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }), c0 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c3))
  lsatlssel(c0, (LSubSp ` c3), c3, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, c3 ‚àà LMod, c3 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c3)
  simplrl(w0, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3), hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c3), c0 ‚äÜ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))
  simpr((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c3))), c0 ‚äÜ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))
  lspsnat(c3, c0, (LSubSp ` c3), hs0, (Base ` c3), (LSpan ` c3), (0 ` c3))
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  eqid((0 ` c3))
  eqid((LSubSp ` c3))
  eqid((LSpan ` c3))
  eqimss(c0, ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))
  biimprcd((c0 ‚äÜ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 })‚Üî c0 =((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 })), c1 =((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }), (c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üî c0 = c1))
  bibi12d(c1 =((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }), c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 = c1, c0 ‚äÜ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }), c0 =((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }))
  sseq2(c1, ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }), c0)
  eqeq2(c1, ((LSpan ` c3)` { hs0 }), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(clmod)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c3))
  diff.hs0.c((0 ` c3))
  diff.hs0.c((LSpan ` c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üî c0 = c1))
}

blocks.name: lsatcmp2
blocks.content: If an atom is included in at-most an atom, they are equal. More general version of ~ lsatcmp . TODO: can ~ lspsncmp shorten this? (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsatcmp2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wss(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsa, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wo(wcel(c1, c4), wceq(c1, csn(c2))))
} = {
  impbid1(w0, wss(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  ex(w0, wss(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wss(c0, c1)), wceq(c0, c1), wss(c0, c1))
  lsatcmp(c0, c1, c4, c3, wa(w0, wss(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, c1), wcel(c3, clvec))
  mpd(wa(w0, wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, c4), wne(c1, csn(c2)))
  lsatssn0(c1, c2, c3, c4, c0, wa(w0, wss(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, c1), wcel(c3, clmod))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c3, clvec))
  lveclmod(c3)
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c4))
  simpr(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, c1), wi(wne(c1, csn(c2)), wcel(c1, c4)))
  necon1ad(c1, csn(c2), w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  ord(w0, wcel(c1, c4), wceq(c1, csn(c2)))
  eqimss(c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lsatcmp2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üî c0 = c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSAtoms ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 ‚àà c4 ‚à® c1 = { c2 }))
} = {
  impbid1(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 = c1)
  ex(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 = c1)
  mpbid((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c1), c0 = c1, c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  lsatcmp(c0, c1, c4, c3, (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, c3 ‚àà LVec)
  mpd((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c1), c1 ‚àà c4, c1 ‚â† { c2 })
  lsatssn0(c1, c2, c3, c4, c0, (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, c3 ‚àà LMod)
  syl(w0, c3 ‚àà LMod, c3 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c3)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚àà c4)
  simpr(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, (c1 ‚â† { c2 } ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4))
  necon1ad(c1, { c2 }, w0, c1 ‚àà c4)
  ord(w0, c1 ‚àà c4, c1 = { c2 })
  eqimss(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: lsatel
blocks.content: A nonzero vector in an atom determines the atom. (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsatel(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(c1, csn(c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clspn, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clsa, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, c3))
} = {
  eqcomd(c0, cfv(c1, csn(c2)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, csn(c2)), c0), wss(cfv(c1, csn(c2)), c0))
  lspsnel5a(c1, c2, c0, cfv(clss, c4), c4, w0)
  lsatcmp(cfv(c1, csn(c2)), c0, c5, c4, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c1, csn(c2)), c5), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c4)), wne(c2, c3))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(c0, cfv(clss, c4)), wcel(c2, c0))
  lsatlssel(c0, cfv(clss, c4), c4, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c4, clvec))
  lveclmod(c4)
  lssel(c0, cfv(clss, c4), c2, cfv(cbs, c4), c4)
  eqid(cfv(clss, c4))
  lsatlspsn2(c4, c2, cfv(cbs, c4), c3, c1, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lsatel(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(c1 ` { c2 }))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(LSpan ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(LSAtoms ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚â† c3)
} = {
  eqcomd(c0, (c1 ` { c2 }), w0)
  mpbid(w0, (c1 ` { c2 })= c0, (c1 ` { c2 })‚äÜ c0)
  lspsnel5a(c1, c2, c0, (LSubSp ` c4), c4, w0)
  lsatcmp((c1 ` { c2 }), c0, c5, c4, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c1 ` { c2 })‚àà c5, c4 ‚àà LMod, c2 ‚àà(Base ` c4), c2 ‚â† c3)
  syl2anc(w0, c2 ‚àà(Base ` c4), c0 ‚àà(LSubSp ` c4), c2 ‚àà c0)
  lsatlssel(c0, (LSubSp ` c4), c4, c5, w0)
  syl(w0, c4 ‚àà LMod, c4 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c4)
  lssel(c0, (LSubSp ` c4), c2, (Base ` c4), c4)
  eqid((LSubSp ` c4))
  lsatlspsn2(c4, c2, (Base ` c4), c3, c1, c5)
  eqid((Base ` c4))
}

blocks.name: lsatelbN
blocks.content: A nonzero vector in an atom determines the atom. (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsatelbN(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c1, cfv(c2, csn(c0)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clspn, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clsa, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c5))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c1, cfv(c2, csn(c0))))
  lsatel(c1, c2, c0, c5, c4, c6, wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, clvec))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c6))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, c5))
  simprd(w0, wne(c0, c5), wcel(c0, c3))
  sylib(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c3), wne(c0, c5)), wcel(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c5))))
  eldifsn(c0, c3, c5)
  mpbird(wa(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(c2, csn(c0)))), wcel(c0, c1), wss(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), c1))
  adantl(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(c2, csn(c0))), wss(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), c1))
  eqimss2(c1, cfv(c2, csn(c0)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(c2, csn(c0))), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), c1)))
  lspsnel5(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(clss, c4), w0)
  lsatlssel(c1, cfv(clss, c4), c4, c6, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clss, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c4, clvec))
  lveclmod(c4)
  eldifad(c0, c3, csn(c5), w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lsatelbN(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî c1 =(c2 ` { c0 })))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(0 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSpan ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(LSAtoms ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c3 \ { c5 }))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c6)
} = {
  impbida(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c1 =(c2 ` { c0 }))
  lsatel(c1, c2, c0, c5, c4, c6, (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚àà LVec)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c1 ‚àà c6)
  simpr(w0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚â† c5)
  simprd(w0, c0 ‚â† c5, c0 ‚àà c3)
  sylib(w0, (c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c0 ‚â† c5), c0 ‚àà(c3 \ { c5 }))
  eldifsn(c0, c3, c5)
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß c1 =(c2 ` { c0 })), c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ` { c0 })‚äÜ c1)
  adantl(w0, c1 =(c2 ` { c0 }), (c2 ` { c0 })‚äÜ c1)
  eqimss2(c1, (c2 ` { c0 }))
  adantr(w0, c1 =(c2 ` { c0 }), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c2 ` { c0 })‚äÜ c1))
  lspsnel5(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (LSubSp ` c4), w0)
  lsatlssel(c1, (LSubSp ` c4), c4, c6, w0)
  eqid((LSubSp ` c4))
  syl(w0, c4 ‚àà LMod, c4 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c4)
  eldifad(c0, c3, { c5 }, w0)
}

blocks.name: lsat2el
blocks.content: Two atoms sharing a nonzero vector are equal. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsat2el(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsa, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c5, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c1))
} = {
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(c5)), w0)
  lsatel(c0, cfv(clspn, c3), c5, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  lsatel(c1, cfv(clspn, c3), c5, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lsat2el(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSAtoms ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚â† c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c1)
} = {
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, ((LSpan ` c3)` { c5 }), w0)
  lsatel(c0, (LSpan ` c3), c5, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  lsatel(c1, (LSpan ` c3), c5, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  eqid((LSpan ` c3))
}

blocks.name: lsmsat
blocks.content: Convert comparison of atom with sum of subspaces to a comparison to sum with atom. ( ~ elpaddatiN analog.) TODO: any way to shorten this? (Contributed by NM, 15-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsmsat(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clss, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clsm, c6))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clsa, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, csn(c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, co(c1, c3, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, c4)))), wrex(hs0, cdif(cfv(cbs, c6), csn(c5)), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c6), csn(cv(hs0))))))
  mpbid(w0, wrex(hs0, cdif(cfv(cbs, c6), csn(c5)), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c6), csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c2, c0))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c2, c0), wrex(hs0, cdif(cfv(cbs, c6), csn(c5)), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c6), csn(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c6, clmod))
  islsat(hs0, c6, clmod, c2, c0, cfv(cbs, c6), c5, cfv(clspn, c6))
  rexlimdv(hs0, cdif(cfv(cbs, c6), csn(c5)), w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c6), csn(cv(hs0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, c4)))))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c6), csn(c5))), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c6), csn(cv(hs0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, c4)))))
  mpbird(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c6), csn(c5))), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c6), csn(cv(hs0))))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, c4)))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cfv(cfv(clspn, c6), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(s0), c3, c4)))))
  mpd(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c6), csn(c5))), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c6), csn(cv(hs0))))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wss(cfv(cfv(clspn, c6), csn(cv(hs0))), co(cv(s0), c3, c4)))), wrex(hs1, c1, wrex(hs2, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c6), cv(hs2))))))
  mpbid(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c6), csn(c5))), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c6), csn(cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs1, c1, wrex(hs2, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c6), cv(hs2))))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c3, c4)))
  mpbird(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c6), csn(c5))), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c6), csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c3, c4)), wss(cfv(cfv(clspn, c6), csn(cv(hs0))), co(c1, c3, c4)))

blocks.name: lsatfixedN
blocks.content: Show equality with the span of the sum of two vectors, one of which ( ` X ` ) is fixed in advance. Compare ~ lspfixed . (Contributed by NM, 29-May-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsatfixedN(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cdif(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), csn(c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(co(c4, c5, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c7))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c7))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clspn, c7))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(clsa, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c3, cfv(c0, csn(c4))))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c3, cfv(c0, csn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c4, c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, cdif(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), csn(c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(co(c4, c5, cv(s0)))))), wrex(hs0, cdif(c6, csn(c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))))
  mpbid(w0, wrex(hs0, cdif(c6, csn(c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c3, c8))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c3, c8), wrex(hs0, cdif(c6, csn(c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c7, clvec))
  islsat(hs0, c7, clvec, c3, c8, c6, c2, c0)
  rexlimdv3a(hs0, cdif(c6, csn(c2)), w0, wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), wrex(s0, cdif(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), csn(c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(co(c4, c5, cv(s0)))))))

  lspfixed(s0, c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c4, c5, c6, c7, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))))

  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c4, c6))
  eqnetrd(cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, csn(c4)), c3, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), wne(c3, cfv(c0, csn(c4))))
  lspsnne1(cv(hs0), c0, c1, c6, c7, c2, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c7, clvec))

  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), wne(c3, cfv(c0, csn(c1))))
  mpbird(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cpr(c4, c1))), wss(cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cpr(c4, c1))))
  eqsstrd(cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cpr(c4, c1)), c3, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))))
  eqcomd(cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c3, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))))
  simp3(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), wss(c3, cfv(c0, cpr(c4, c1))))
  lspsnel5(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cpr(c4, c1)), c0, c6, c7, cfv(clss, c7), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c7, clmod))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c0, cpr(c4, c1)), cfv(clss, c7)))
  lspprcl(c0, c4, c1, cfv(clss, c7), c6, c7, w0)
  eldifad(cv(hs0), c6, csn(c2), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))))
  simp2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  rexbidva(s0, cdif(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), csn(c2)), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(co(c4, c5, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, csn(co(c4, c5, cv(s0))))))
  3bitr4rd(wa(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), csn(c2)))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(co(c4, c5, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, csn(co(c4, c5, cv(s0))))), wss(cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, csn(co(c4, c5, cv(s0))))), wceq(cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, csn(co(c4, c5, cv(s0))))))
  lspsncmp(c0, cv(hs0), co(c4, c5, cv(s0)), c6, c7, c2, wa(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c6, csn(c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), csn(c2)))))

blocks.name: lsmsatcv
blocks.content: Subspace sum has the covering property (using spans of singletons to represent atoms). Similar to Exercise 5 of [Kalmbach] p. 153. ( ~ spansncvi analog.) Explicit atom version of ~ lsmcv . (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: lssatomic
blocks.content: The lattice of subspaces is atomic, i.e. any nonzero element is greater than or equal to some atom. ( ~ shatomici analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)

thm lssatomic(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

} = {
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c1)), wrex(hs0, c1, wne(cv(hs0), c4)))

  syl2anc(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))

  simp3(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), c4))
  lsatlspsn2(c3, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3), c4, cfv(clspn, c3), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  lspsnel5a(cfv(clspn, c3), cv(hs0), c1, c2, c3, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), c4)))
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c3))

  rspcev(s0, cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0))), c0, wss(cfv(cfv(clspn, c3), csn(cv(hs0))), c1), wss(cv(s0), c1))

} = {

  iman(s0 ‚äÜ c1, s0 ‚äÜ c2)

blocks.name: lrelat
blocks.content: Subspaces are relatively atomic. Remark 2 of [Kalmbach] p. 149. ( ~ chrelati analog.) (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lrelat(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wpss(c1, co(c1, c2, cv(s0))), wss(co(c1, c2, cv(s0)), c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clss, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clsm, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clsa, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wpss(c1, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wpss(c1, co(c1, c2, cv(s0))), wss(co(c1, c2, cv(s0)), c3))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c3), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)))))
  lpssat(s0, c0, c3, c1, c4, c5, w0)
  rexbidva(s0, c0, w0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c3), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1))), wa(wpss(c1, co(c1, c2, cv(s0))), wss(co(c1, c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  syl5bb(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), c3), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1))), wa(wpss(c1, co(c1, c2, cv(s0))), wss(co(c1, c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wa(wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))
  ancom(wss(cv(s0), c3), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)))
  anbi12d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wn(wss(cv(s0), c1)), wss(cv(s0), c3), wpss(c1, co(c1, c2, cv(s0))), wss(co(c1, c2, cv(s0)), c3))
  lssnle(cv(s0), c1, c2, c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  bitrd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wss(cv(s0), c3), wss(co(c1, c2, cv(s0)), c3), wa(wss(c1, c3), wss(cv(s0), c3)))
  biantrurd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wss(cv(s0), c3), wss(c1, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(c1, c3))
  pssssd(c1, c3, w0)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wa(wss(c1, c3), wss(cv(s0), c3)), wss(co(c1, c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  sseldd(c1, cfv(csubg, c5), c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c4))
  sseldd(cv(s0), cfv(csubg, c5), c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  lsatlssel(cv(s0), c4, c5, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sseldd(c3, cfv(csubg, c5), c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wss(c4, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lsssssubg(c5, c4)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c3, c4))
  lsmlub(c1, c5, cv(s0), c3, c2)
}

  biantrurd((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), s0 ‚äÜ c3, c1 ‚äÜ c3)
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c3)
  pssssd(c1, c3, w0)
  syl3anc((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), ((c1 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß s0 ‚äÜ c3)‚Üî(c1[c2]s0)‚äÜ c3), c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), s0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), c3 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  sseldd(c1, (SubGrp ` c5), c4, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c4)
  sseldd(s0, (SubGrp ` c5), c4, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  lsatlssel(s0, c4, c5, c0, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  simpr(w0, s0 ‚àà c0)
  sseldd(c3, (SubGrp ` c5), c4, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))

  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c4)

blocks.name: lssatle
blocks.content: The ordering of two subspaces is determined by the atoms under them. ( ~ chrelat3 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lssatle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clsa, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  impbid2(w0, wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))))
  ralrimivw(s0, c2, wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1)))
  expcom(wss(c0, c1), wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))
  sstr(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  syl5bir(w0, wral(s0, c2, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))), wss(c0, c1), wss(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0)), crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))))
  ss2rab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))
  sylibrd(w0, wss(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0)), crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))), wss(c0, c1), wss(cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0)))), cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))))))
  ex(w0, wss(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0)), crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))), wss(cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0)))), cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))))))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wss(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0)), crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1)))), wss(cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0)))), cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))))), wcel(c4, clmod), wss(cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))), cfv(cbs, c4)), wss(cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0))), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1)))))
  adantr(w0, wss(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0)), crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))), wcel(c4, clmod))
  adantr(w0, wss(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0)), crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))), wss(cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))), cfv(cbs, c4)))
  sstrd(cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))), cfv(cbs, c4), cuni(crab(s0, c3, wss(cv(s0), c1))), w0)
  4syl(w0, wss(cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))), cuni(crab(s0, c3, wss(cv(s0), c1)))), wcel(c4, clmod), wss(c2, c3), wss(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1)), crab(s0, c3, wss(cv(s0), c1))))
  lsatlss(c4, c2, c3)
  rabss2(s0, c2, c3, wss(cv(s0), c1))
  uniss(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1)), crab(s0, c3, wss(cv(s0), c1)))
  eqsstrd(cuni(crab(s0, c3, wss(cv(s0), c1))), cfv(cbs, c4), c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cuni(crab(s0, c3, wss(cv(s0), c1))), c1), wcel(c1, c3))
  unimax(s0, c1, c3)
  syl(w0, wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(c1, c3))
  lssss(c1, c3, cfv(cbs, c4), c4)
  adantl(w0, wss(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0)), crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))), wss(cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0))), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1)))))
  uniss(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0)), crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1)))
  lspss(c4, cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))), cfv(cbs, c4), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0))), cfv(clspn, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  sseq12d(c0, c1, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0)))), cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1)))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c0))))), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c0, c3))
  lssats(s0, c4, c0, c3, cfv(clspn, c4), c2)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))))), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c1, c3))
  lssats(s0, c4, c1, c3, cfv(clspn, c4), c2)
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c4))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, clspn, c4)
  diff.clspn.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: lssat
blocks.content: Two subspaces in a proper subset relationship imply the existence of a 1-dim subspace less than or equal to one but not the other. ( ~ chpssati analog.) (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2014.)

  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wss(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c3)), crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c1))), wss(c3, c1))

  sstrd(cuni(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c1))), cfv(cbs, c0), cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wss(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c3)), crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c1)))))

  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wss(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c3)), crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c1)))), wceq(cuni(crab(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), c1))), c1), wcel(c1, c2))

  lssss(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wss(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c3)), crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c1))), wss(cuni(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c3))), cuni(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c1)))))
  uniss(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c3)), crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c1)))

  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))

  simpl1(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wss(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c3)), crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c1))))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wss(crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c3)), crab(s0, c4, wss(cv(s0), c1))))

  eqid(cfv(clspn, c0))

  ex((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), { s0 ‚àà c4 | s0 ‚äÜ c3 } ‚äÜ { s0 ‚àà c4 | s0 ‚äÜ c1 }, c3 ‚äÜ c1)

blocks.name: islshpat
blocks.content: Hyperplane properties expressed with subspace sum and an atom. TODO: can proof be shortened? Seems long for a simple variation of ~ islshpsm . (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: clcv
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the covering relation for a left module or left vector space.
blocks.origin: const class clcv { <oL }

blocks.name: diff.clcv.s
diff.clcv.c
diff.clcv.w
df-lcv
blocks.content: Define the covering relation for subspaces of a left vector space. Similar to Definition 3.2.18 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 68. Ptak/Pulmannova's notation ` A ( <oL `` W ) B ` is read " ` B ` covers ` A ` " or " ` A ` is covered by ` B ` " , and it means that ` B ` is larger than ` A ` and there is nothing in between. See ~ lcvbr for binary relation. ( ~ df-cv analog.) (Contributed by NM, 7-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-lcv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(clcv, cmpt(s0, universe, copab(s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(clss, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(clss, cv(s0)))), wa(wpss(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wn(wrex(s3, cfv(clss, cv(s0)), wa(wpss(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wpss(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-lcv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ <oL =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { < s1, s2 > |((s1 ‚àà(LSubSp ` s0)‚àß s2 ‚àà(LSubSp ` s0))‚àß(s1 ‚ää s2 ‚àß ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà(LSubSp ` s0),(s1 ‚ää s3 ‚àß s3 ‚ää s2))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
}

blocks.name: lcvfbr
blocks.content: The covers relation for a left vector space (or a left module). (Contributed by NM, 7-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lcvfbr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clss, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clcv, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))))), diffsc(s2, c2))
  syl5eq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))), cfv(clcv, c2), w0)
  3syl(w0, wceq(cfv(clcv, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c2, c3)
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, universe, clcv, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))), copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(clss, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(clss, cv(hs0)))), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))))
  opabbidv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(clss, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(clss, cv(hs0)))), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(clss, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(clss, cv(hs0)))), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(clss, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(clss, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  eleq2d(cv(s1), cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wn(wrex(s2, c1, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(s2, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  rexeqdv(s2, cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(clss, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(clss, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, clss)
  df-lcv(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  ssexi(copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))), cxp(c1, c1))
  xpex(c1, c1)
  fvexi(c1, clss, c2)
  opabssxp(s0, s1, c1, c1, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, wa(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wpss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, clss, cv(hs0))
  diff.clss.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)

  diff.hs0.s(s0)

}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚àß(s0 ‚ää s1 ‚àß ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0 ‚ää s2 ‚àß s2 ‚ää s1))))})

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚àß(s0 ‚ää s1 ‚àß ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0 ‚ää s2 ‚àß s2 ‚ää s1))))}), d(s2, c2))
  syl5eq(c0, { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚àß(s0 ‚ää s1 ‚àß ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0 ‚ää s2 ‚àß s2 ‚ää s1))))}, (<oL ` c2), w0)
  3syl(w0, (<oL ` c2)= { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚àß(s0 ‚ää s1 ‚àß ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s0 ‚ää s2 ‚àß s2 ‚ää s1))))}, c2 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c2, c3)

thm lcvbr2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

thm lcvntr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

blocks.name: lcvat
blocks.content: If a subspace covers another, it equals the other joined with some atom. This is a consequence of relative atomicity. ( ~ cvati analog.) (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lcvat(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(co(c1, c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clss, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clsm, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clsa, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clcv, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, c6, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(co(c1, c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wpss(c1, co(c1, c2, cv(s0))), wss(co(c1, c2, cv(s0)), c3))))
  lrelat(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  lcvpss(c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, clmod, w0)

thm lsatcveq0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2 ‚Üî c0 = { c3 }))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(LSubSp ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(LSAtoms ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(<oL ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c6)
} = {
  impbid(w0, c0[c1]c2, c0 = { c3 })
  syld(w0, c0[c1]c2, c0 = { c3 }, c0 ‚ää c2)
  ex(w0, c0[c1]c2, c0 ‚ää c2)
  lcvpss(c0, c2, c5, c4, c1, clvec, (w0 ‚àß c0[c1]c2))
  adantr(w0, c0[c1]c2, c4 ‚àà LVec)
  adantr(w0, c0[c1]c2, c0 ‚àà c5)
  adantr(w0, c0[c1]c2, c2 ‚àà c5)
  simpr(w0, c0[c1]c2)
  mpd(w0, (c0 ‚ää c2 ‚Üí c0 = { c3 }), { c3 }[c1]c2)
  3exp(w0, { c3 }[c1]c2, c0 ‚ää c2, c0 = { c3 })
  lcvnbtwn3(c0, { c3 }, c5, c4, c1, clvec, c2, (w0 ‚àß { c3 }[c1]c2 ‚àß c0 ‚ää c2))
  3ad2ant1(w0, { c3 }[c1]c2, c0 ‚ää c2, c4 ‚àà LVec)
  3ad2ant1(w0, { c3 }[c1]c2, c0 ‚ää c2, { c3 } ‚àà c5)
  syl(w0, { c3 } ‚àà c5, c4 ‚àà LMod)
  lsssn0(c4, c3, c5)
  3ad2ant1(w0, { c3 }[c1]c2, c0 ‚ää c2, c2 ‚àà c5)
  lsatlssel(c2, c5, c4, c6, w0)
  3ad2ant1(w0, { c3 }[c1]c2, c0 ‚ää c2, c0 ‚àà c5)
  simp2(w0, { c3 }[c1]c2, c0 ‚ää c2)
  3ad2ant1(w0, { c3 }[c1]c2, c0 ‚ää c2, { c3 } ‚äÜ c0)
  syl2anc(w0, { c3 } ‚äÜ c0, c4 ‚àà LMod, c0 ‚àà c5)
  syl(w0, c4 ‚àà LMod, c4 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c4)
  lss0ss(c4, c0, c5, c3)
  simp3(w0, { c3 }[c1]c2, c0 ‚ää c2)
  syl5ibrcom(w0, c0 = { c3 }, c0[c1]c2, { c3 }[c1]c2)
  lsatcv0(c3, c1, c2, c4, c6, w0)
  breq1(c0, { c3 }, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: lsat0cv
blocks.content: A subspace is an atom iff it covers the zero subspace. This could serve as an alternate definition of an atom. TODO: this is a quick-and-dirty proof that could probably be more efficient. (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2015.)

  diff.hs1.c((hs0 ‚ãÇ c3))
  diff.hs1.w((((c0 ‚ãÇ c3)‚äÜ(hs0 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àß(hs0 ‚ãÇ c3)‚äÜ c3)‚Üí((hs0 ‚ãÇ c3)=(c0 ‚ãÇ c3)‚à®(hs0 ‚ãÇ c3)= c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[c2]c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

blocks.name: lcvexch

thm lcvexch(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clcv, c5))

} = {

  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, c2, co(c0, c3, c1)), wcel(c1, c4))

blocks.content: Covering property of Definition 7.4 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 31 and its converse. ( ~ cvp analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)

thm lcvp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(cin(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wbr(c0, c3, co(c0, c4, c1))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clss, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsm, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clsa, c6))

} = {

  lsatcveq0(cin(c0, c1), c3, c1, c2, c6, c5, c7, w0)

  lsatlssel(c1, c5, c6, c7, w0)

  lveclmod(c6)
}

thm lcv1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  mpd(wa(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1))), wbr(c1, c2, co(c1, c3, c0)), wrex(hs0, cdif(cfv(cbs, c5), csn(cfv(c0g, c5))), wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), csn(cv(hs0))))))

  breqtrrd(c1, c2, co(c1, c3, c0), co(c1, c3, cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), csn(cv(hs0)))), w3a(wa(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c5), csn(cfv(c0g, c5)))), wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), csn(cv(hs0))))))

  eqid(cfv(cbs, c5))
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c5))
  3ad2ant1(wa(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c5), csn(cfv(c0g, c5)))), wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c5, clvec))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c5, clvec))
  3ad2ant1(wa(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c5), csn(cfv(c0g, c5)))), wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c1, c4))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, c4))
  3ad2ant2(wa(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c5), csn(cfv(c0g, c5)))), wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c5)))

  oveq2d(c1, c3, c0, cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), csn(cv(hs0))), w3a(wa(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cbs, c5), csn(cfv(c0g, c5)))), wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clspn, c5), csn(cv(hs0))))))

  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c5))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(clspn, c5))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1))))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c1, c2, co(c1, c3, c0)))

thm lcv1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(¬¨ c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üî c1[c2](c1[c3]c0)))

  breqtrrd(c1, c2, (c1[c3]c0), (c1[c3]((LSpan ` c5)` { hs0 })), ((w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà((Base ` c5)\ {(0 ` c5)})‚àß c0 =((LSpan ` c5)` { hs0 })))
  lsmcv2(c1, c2, c3, (LSpan ` c5), hs0, (Base ` c5), c5, c4, ((w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà((Base ` c5)\ {(0 ` c5)})‚àß c0 =((LSpan ` c5)` { hs0 })))

  simp1r(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚äÜ c1, hs0 ‚àà((Base ` c5)\ {(0 ` c5)}), c0 =((LSpan ` c5)` { hs0 }))
