blocks.name: lcv2
blocks.content: Covering property of a subspace plus an atom. ( ~ chcv2 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lcv2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wpss(c0, co(c0, c1, c2)), wbr(c0, c3, co(c0, c1, c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clss, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clsm, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clsa, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clcv, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
} = {
  bitr3d(w0, wpss(c0, co(c0, c1, c2)), wbr(c0, c3, co(c0, c1, c2)), wn(wss(c2, c0)))
  lssnle(c2, c0, c1, c5, w0)
  sseldd(c0, cfv(csubg, c5), c4, w0)
  sseldd(c2, cfv(csubg, c5), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c4, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lsssssubg(c5, c4)
  lsatlssel(c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c5, clvec))
  lveclmod(c5)
  lcv1(c2, c0, c3, c1, c4, c5, c6, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lcv2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚ää(c0[c1]c2)‚Üî c0[c3](c0[c1]c2)))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSubSp ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(LSSum ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(LSAtoms ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(<oL ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c6)
} = {
  bitr3d(w0, c0 ‚ää(c0[c1]c2), c0[c3](c0[c1]c2), ¬¨ c2 ‚äÜ c0)
  lssnle(c2, c0, c1, c5, w0)
  sseldd(c0, (SubGrp ` c5), c4, w0)
  sseldd(c2, (SubGrp ` c5), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c4 ‚äÜ(SubGrp ` c5), c5 ‚àà LMod)
  lsssssubg(c5, c4)
  lsatlssel(c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, c5 ‚àà LMod, c5 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c5)
  lcv1(c2, c0, c3, c1, c4, c5, c6, w0)
}

blocks.name: lsatexch
blocks.content: The atom exchange property. Proposition 1(i) of [Kalmbach] p. 140. A version of this theorem was originally proved by Hermann Grassmann in 1862. ( ~ atexch analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsatexch(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clss, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clsm, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clsa, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, co(c1, c2, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c1, c3), csn(c6)))
} = {
  sseqtr4d(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), co(c1, c2, c0), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(c0, co(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  lsmub2(c1, c5, c0, c2)
  lcvnbtwn2(co(c1, c2, c3), co(c1, c2, c0), c4, c5, cfv(clcv, c5), clvec, c1, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wbr(c1, cfv(clcv, c5), co(c1, c2, c0)), wpss(c1, co(c1, c2, c0)))
  psssstrd(c1, co(c1, c2, c0), co(c1, c2, c3), w0)
  lcv2(c1, c2, c0, cfv(clcv, c5), c4, c5, c7, w0)
  lcvpss(c1, co(c1, c2, c3), c4, c5, cfv(clcv, c5), clvec, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  lsmcl(c5, c1, c4, c3, c2)
  mpbid(w0, wbr(c1, cfv(clcv, c5), co(c1, c2, c3)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), csn(c6)))
  lcvp(c1, c3, c6, cfv(clcv, c5), c2, c4, c5, c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clcv, c5))
  mpbi2and(w0, wss(co(c1, c2, c3), co(c1, c2, c0)), wss(c1, co(c1, c2, c0)), wss(c3, co(c1, c2, c0)))
  syl2anc(w0, wss(c1, co(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  sseldd(c0, cfv(csubg, c5), c4, w0)
  lsmub1(c1, c5, c0, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wa(wss(c1, co(c1, c2, c0)), wss(c3, co(c1, c2, c0))), wss(co(c1, c2, c3), co(c1, c2, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(co(c1, c2, c0), cfv(csubg, c5)))
  sseldd(c1, cfv(csubg, c5), c4, w0)
  sseldd(c3, cfv(csubg, c5), c4, w0)
  lsatlssel(c3, c4, c5, c7, w0)
  sseldd(co(c1, c2, c0), cfv(csubg, c5), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c4, cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lsssssubg(c5, c4)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c1, c2, c0), c4), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c0, c4))
  lsatlssel(c0, c4, c5, c7, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c5, clvec))
  lveclmod(c5)
  lsmcl(c5, c1, c4, c0, c2)
  lsmlub(c1, c5, c3, co(c1, c2, c0), c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lsatexch(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ(c1[c2]c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSubSp ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSSum ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(0 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(LSAtoms ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚äÜ(c1[c2]c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= { c6 })
} = {
  sseqtr4d(c0, (c1[c2]c3), (c1[c2]c0), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ‚äÜ(c1[c2]c0), c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  lsmub2(c1, c5, c0, c2)
  lcvnbtwn2((c1[c2]c3), (c1[c2]c0), c4, c5, (<oL ` c5), clvec, c1, w0)
  mpbid(w0, c1[(<oL ` c5)](c1[c2]c0), c1 ‚ää(c1[c2]c0))
  psssstrd(c1, (c1[c2]c0), (c1[c2]c3), w0)
  lcv2(c1, c2, c0, (<oL ` c5), c4, c5, c7, w0)
  lcvpss(c1, (c1[c2]c3), c4, c5, (<oL ` c5), clvec, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c1[c2]c3)‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c4, c3 ‚àà c4)
  lsmcl(c5, c1, c4, c3, c2)
  mpbid(w0, c1[(<oL ` c5)](c1[c2]c3), (c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= { c6 })
  lcvp(c1, c3, c6, (<oL ` c5), c2, c4, c5, c7, w0)
  eqid((<oL ` c5))
  mpbi2and(w0, (c1[c2]c3)‚äÜ(c1[c2]c0), c1 ‚äÜ(c1[c2]c0), c3 ‚äÜ(c1[c2]c0))
  syl2anc(w0, c1 ‚äÜ(c1[c2]c0), c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  sseldd(c0, (SubGrp ` c5), c4, w0)
  lsmub1(c1, c5, c0, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, ((c1 ‚äÜ(c1[c2]c0)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ(c1[c2]c0))‚Üî(c1[c2]c3)‚äÜ(c1[c2]c0)), c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), c3 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c5), (c1[c2]c0)‚àà(SubGrp ` c5))
  sseldd(c1, (SubGrp ` c5), c4, w0)
  sseldd(c3, (SubGrp ` c5), c4, w0)
  lsatlssel(c3, c4, c5, c7, w0)
  sseldd((c1[c2]c0), (SubGrp ` c5), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c4 ‚äÜ(SubGrp ` c5), c5 ‚àà LMod)
  lsssssubg(c5, c4)
  syl3anc(w0, (c1[c2]c0)‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà LMod, c1 ‚àà c4, c0 ‚àà c4)
  lsatlssel(c0, c4, c5, c7, w0)
  syl(w0, c5 ‚àà LMod, c5 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c5)
  lsmcl(c5, c1, c4, c0, c2)
  lsmlub(c1, c5, c3, (c1[c2]c0), c2)
}

blocks.name: lsatnle
blocks.content: The meet of a subspace and an incomparable atom is the zero subspace. ( ~ atnssm0 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsatnle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wn(wss(c0, c1)), wceq(cin(c1, c0), csn(c2))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clss, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clsa, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
} = {
  bitr4d(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1)), wceq(cin(c1, c0), csn(c2)), wbr(c1, cfv(clcv, c3), co(c1, cfv(clsm, c3), c0)))
  lcv1(c0, c1, cfv(clcv, c3), cfv(clsm, c3), c4, c3, c5, w0)
  lcvp(c1, c0, c2, cfv(clcv, c3), cfv(clsm, c3), c4, c3, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clsm, c3))
  eqid(cfv(clcv, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lsatnle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(¬¨ c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üî(c1 ‚ãÇ c0)= { c2 }))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSubSp ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(LSAtoms ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)
} = {
  bitr4d(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚äÜ c1, (c1 ‚ãÇ c0)= { c2 }, c1[(<oL ` c3)](c1[(LSSum ` c3)]c0))
  lcv1(c0, c1, (<oL ` c3), (LSSum ` c3), c4, c3, c5, w0)
  lcvp(c1, c0, c2, (<oL ` c3), (LSSum ` c3), c4, c3, c5, w0)
  eqid((LSSum ` c3))
  eqid((<oL ` c3))
}

blocks.name: lsatnem0
blocks.content: The meet of distinct atoms is the zero subspace. ( ~ atnemeq0 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsatnem0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wne(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), csn(c2))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsa, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  bitr3d(w0, wne(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wn(wss(c1, c0)))
  necon3bbid(c0, c1, w0, wss(c1, c0))
  syl6bb(w0, wss(c1, c0), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c1, c0))
  lsatcmp(c1, c0, c4, c3, w0)
  eqcom(c1, c0)
  lsatnle(c1, c0, c2, c3, cfv(clss, c3), c4, w0)
  lsatlssel(c0, cfv(clss, c3), c3, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clss, c3))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c3, clvec))
  lveclmod(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lsatnem0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚â† c1 ‚Üî(c0 ‚ãÇ c1)= { c2 }))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSAtoms ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
} = {
  bitr3d(w0, c0 ‚â† c1, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1)= { c2 }, ¬¨ c1 ‚äÜ c0)
  necon3bbid(c0, c1, w0, c1 ‚äÜ c0)
  syl6bb(w0, c1 ‚äÜ c0, c0 = c1, c1 = c0)
  lsatcmp(c1, c0, c4, c3, w0)
  eqcom(c1, c0)
  lsatnle(c1, c0, c2, c3, (LSubSp ` c3), c4, w0)
  lsatlssel(c0, (LSubSp ` c3), c3, c4, w0)
  eqid((LSubSp ` c3))
  syl(w0, c3 ‚àà LMod, c3 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c3)
}

blocks.name: lsatexch1
blocks.content: The atom exch1ange property. ( ~ hlatexch1 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 14-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsatexch1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clsm, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clsa, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, co(c1, c2, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c3, c1))
} = {
  lsatexch(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(clss, c4), c4, cfv(c0g, c4), c5, w0)
  lsatlssel(c1, cfv(clss, c4), c4, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clss, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c4, clvec))
  lveclmod(c4)
  mpbid(w0, wceq(cin(c1, c3), csn(cfv(c0g, c4))), wne(c1, c3))
  necomd(c1, c3, w0)
  lsatnem0(c1, c3, cfv(c0g, c4), c4, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lsatexch1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ(c1[c2]c3))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSSum ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(LSAtoms ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚äÜ(c1[c2]c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚â† c1)
} = {
  lsatexch(c0, c1, c2, c3, (LSubSp ` c4), c4, (0 ` c4), c5, w0)
  lsatlssel(c1, (LSubSp ` c4), c4, c5, w0)
  eqid((LSubSp ` c4))
  syl(w0, c4 ‚àà LMod, c4 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c4)
  mpbid(w0, (c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= {(0 ` c4)}, c1 ‚â† c3)
  necomd(c1, c3, w0)
  lsatnem0(c1, c3, (0 ` c4), c4, c5, w0)
  eqid((0 ` c4))
}

blocks.name: lsatcv0eq
blocks.content: If the sum of two atoms cover the zero subspace, they are equal. ( ~ atcv0eq analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsatcv0eq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(csn(c0), c1, co(c2, c3, c4)), wceq(c2, c4)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clsm, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clsa, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clcv, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
} = {
  impbid(w0, wbr(csn(c0), c1, co(c2, c3, c4)), wceq(c2, c4))
  necon4ad(c2, c4, w0, wbr(csn(c0), c1, co(c2, c3, c4)))
  sylbid(w0, wne(c2, c4), wn(wbr(csn(c0), c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), wa(wbr(csn(c0), c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, co(c2, c3, c4))))
  3bitrd(w0, wne(c2, c4), wa(wbr(csn(c0), c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), wceq(cin(c2, c4), csn(c0)), wbr(c2, c1, co(c2, c3, c4)))
  lsatnem0(c2, c4, c0, c5, c6, w0)
  lcvp(c2, c4, c0, c1, c3, cfv(clss, c5), c5, c6, w0)
  biantrurd(w0, wbr(c2, c1, co(c2, c3, c4)), wbr(csn(c0), c1, c2))
  ex(w0, wa(wbr(csn(c0), c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), wn(wbr(csn(c0), c1, co(c2, c3, c4))))
  lcvntr(csn(c0), c1, co(c2, c3, c4), cfv(clss, c5), c5, clvec, c2, wa(w0, wa(wbr(csn(c0), c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, co(c2, c3, c4)))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(csn(c0), c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), wcel(c5, clvec))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(csn(c0), c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), wcel(csn(c0), cfv(clss, c5)))
  syl(w0, wcel(csn(c0), cfv(clss, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lsssn0(c5, c0, cfv(clss, c5))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(csn(c0), c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), wcel(c2, cfv(clss, c5)))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(csn(c0), c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, co(c2, c3, c4))), wcel(co(c2, c3, c4), cfv(clss, c5)))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c2, c3, c4), cfv(clss, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c2, cfv(clss, c5)), wcel(c4, cfv(clss, c5)))
  lsatlssel(c4, cfv(clss, c5), c5, c6, w0)
  lsmcl(c5, c2, cfv(clss, c5), c4, c3)
  simprl(w0, wbr(csn(c0), c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, co(c2, c3, c4)))
  simprr(w0, wbr(csn(c0), c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, co(c2, c3, c4)))
  syl5ibcom(w0, wceq(c2, c4), wbr(csn(c0), c1, co(c2, c3, c4)), wbr(csn(c0), c1, co(c2, c3, c2)))
  breqtrrd(csn(c0), c1, co(c2, c3, c2), c2, w0)
  lsatcv0(c0, c1, c2, c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(c2, c3, c2), c2), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c5)))
  sseldd(c2, cfv(csubg, c5), cfv(clss, c5), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cfv(clss, c5), cfv(csubg, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod))
  lsssssubg(c5, cfv(clss, c5))
  lsatlssel(c2, cfv(clss, c5), c5, c6, w0)

blocks.name: lsatcvat
blocks.content: A nonzero subspace less than the sum of two atoms is an atom. ( ~ atcvati analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsatcvat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clss, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clsm, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clsa, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, csn(c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wpss(c0, co(c6, c5, c7)))
} = {
  mpjaodan(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wn(wss(c6, c0)), wn(wss(c7, c0)))
  lsatcvatlem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, wa(w0, wn(wss(c6, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c6, c0)), wcel(c3, clvec))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c6, c0)), wcel(c0, c4))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c6, c0)), wcel(c6, c1))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c6, c0)), wcel(c7, c1))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c6, c0)), wne(c0, csn(c2)))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c6, c0)), wpss(c0, co(c6, c5, c7)))
  simpr(w0, wn(wss(c6, c0)))
  lsatcvatlem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c7, c6, wa(w0, wn(wss(c7, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c7, c0)), wcel(c3, clvec))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c7, c0)), wcel(c0, c4))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c7, c0)), wcel(c7, c1))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c7, c0)), wcel(c6, c1))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c7, c0)), wne(c0, csn(c2)))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c7, c0)), wpss(c0, co(c7, c5, c6)))
  mpbid(w0, wpss(c0, co(c7, c5, c6)), wpss(c0, co(c6, c5, c7)))
  psseq2d(c0, co(c6, c5, c7), co(c7, c5, c6), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(c6, c5, c7), co(c7, c5, c6)), wcel(c3, cabl), wcel(c6, cfv(csubg, c3)), wcel(c7, cfv(csubg, c3)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cabl), wcel(c3, clmod))
  lmodabl(c3)
  lsmcom(c3, c6, c7, c5)
  simpr(w0, wn(wss(c7, c0)))
  mpd(w0, wo(wn(wss(c6, c0)), wn(wss(c7, c0))), wpss(c0, co(c6, c5, c7)))
  syl6ib(w0, wpss(c0, co(c6, c5, c7)), wo(wn(wss(c6, c0)), wn(wss(c7, c0))), wn(wa(wss(c6, c0), wss(c7, c0))))
  con2d(w0, wpss(c0, co(c6, c5, c7)), wa(wss(c6, c0), wss(c7, c0)))
  syl6bi(w0, wa(wss(c6, c0), wss(c7, c0)), wn(wpss(c0, co(c6, c5, c7))), wss(co(c6, c5, c7), c0))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wa(wss(c6, c0), wss(c7, c0)), wss(co(c6, c5, c7), c0)), wcel(c6, cfv(csubg, c3)), wcel(c7, cfv(csubg, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c3)))
  sseldd(c6, cfv(csubg, c3), c4, w0)
  lsatlssel(c6, c4, c3, c1, w0)
  sseldd(c7, cfv(csubg, c3), c4, w0)
  lsatlssel(c7, c4, c3, c1, w0)
  sseldd(c0, cfv(csubg, c3), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c4, cfv(csubg, c3)), wcel(c3, clmod))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c3, clvec))
  lveclmod(c3)
  lsssssubg(c3, c4)
  lsmlub(c6, c3, c7, c0, c5)
  ssnpss(co(c6, c5, c7), c0)
  ianor(wss(c6, c0), wss(c7, c0))

blocks.pretty:
thm lsatcvat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSubSp ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(LSSum ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(LSAtoms ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚â† { c2 })
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚ää(c6[c5]c7))
} = {
  mpjaodan(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ c6 ‚äÜ c0, ¬¨ c7 ‚äÜ c0)
  lsatcvatlem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, (w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c6 ‚äÜ c0))
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c6 ‚äÜ c0, c3 ‚àà LVec)
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c6 ‚äÜ c0, c0 ‚àà c4)

  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c6 ‚äÜ c0, c7 ‚àà c1)
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c6 ‚äÜ c0, c0 ‚â† { c2 })
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c6 ‚äÜ c0, c0 ‚ää(c6[c5]c7))
  simpr(w0, ¬¨ c6 ‚äÜ c0)
  lsatcvatlem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c7, c6, (w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c7 ‚äÜ c0))
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c7 ‚äÜ c0, c3 ‚àà LVec)
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c7 ‚äÜ c0, c0 ‚àà c4)
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c7 ‚äÜ c0, c7 ‚àà c1)
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c7 ‚äÜ c0, c6 ‚àà c1)
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c7 ‚äÜ c0, c0 ‚â† { c2 })
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c7 ‚äÜ c0, c0 ‚ää(c7[c5]c6))
  mpbid(w0, c0 ‚ää(c7[c5]c6), c0 ‚ää(c6[c5]c7))
  psseq2d(c0, (c6[c5]c7), (c7[c5]c6), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c6[c5]c7)=(c7[c5]c6), c3 ‚àà Abel, c6 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c3), c7 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c3))
  syl(w0, c3 ‚àà Abel, c3 ‚àà LMod)
  lmodabl(c3)
  lsmcom(c3, c6, c7, c5)
  simpr(w0, ¬¨ c7 ‚äÜ c0)
  mpd(w0, (¬¨ c6 ‚äÜ c0 ‚à® ¬¨ c7 ‚äÜ c0), c0 ‚ää(c6[c5]c7))
  syl6ib(w0, c0 ‚ää(c6[c5]c7), (¬¨ c6 ‚äÜ c0 ‚à® ¬¨ c7 ‚äÜ c0), ¬¨(c6 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c7 ‚äÜ c0))
  con2d(w0, c0 ‚ää(c6[c5]c7), (c6 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c7 ‚äÜ c0))
  syl6bi(w0, (c6 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c7 ‚äÜ c0), ¬¨ c0 ‚ää(c6[c5]c7), (c6[c5]c7)‚äÜ c0)
  syl3anc(w0, ((c6 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c7 ‚äÜ c0)‚Üî(c6[c5]c7)‚äÜ c0), c6 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c3), c7 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c3), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c3))
  sseldd(c6, (SubGrp ` c3), c4, w0)
  lsatlssel(c6, c4, c3, c1, w0)
  sseldd(c7, (SubGrp ` c3), c4, w0)
  lsatlssel(c7, c4, c3, c1, w0)
  sseldd(c0, (SubGrp ` c3), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c4 ‚äÜ(SubGrp ` c3), c3 ‚àà LMod)
  syl(w0, c3 ‚àà LMod, c3 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c3)
  lsssssubg(c3, c4)
  lsmlub(c6, c3, c7, c0, c5)
  ssnpss((c6[c5]c7), c0)
  ianor(c6 ‚äÜ c0, c7 ‚äÜ c0)
}

blocks.name: lsatcvat2
blocks.content: A subspace covered by the sum of two distinct atoms is an atom. ( ~ atcvat2i analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsatcvat2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsm, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clsa, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clcv, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c6, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c5, co(c6, c4, c7)))
} = {
  lsatcvat(c0, c1, cfv(c0g, c3), c3, c2, c4, c6, c7, w0)
  mpbird(w0, wne(c0, csn(cfv(c0g, c3))), wne(c6, c7))
  necon3bid(c0, csn(cfv(c0g, c3)), c6, c7, w0)
  lsatcv1(c0, cfv(c0g, c3), c6, c7, c3, c4, c2, c1, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c3))
  lcvpss(c0, co(c6, c4, c7), c2, c3, c5, clvec, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c6, c4, c7), c2), wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c6, c2), wcel(c7, c2))
  lsatlssel(c6, c2, c3, c1, w0)
  lsatlssel(c7, c2, c3, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c3, clvec))
  lveclmod(c3)
  lsmcl(c3, c6, c2, c7, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lsatcvat2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSubSp ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSSum ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(LSAtoms ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(<oL ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚â† c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[c5](c6[c4]c7))
} = {
  lsatcvat(c0, c1, (0 ` c3), c3, c2, c4, c6, c7, w0)
  mpbird(w0, c0 ‚â† {(0 ` c3)}, c6 ‚â† c7)
  necon3bid(c0, {(0 ` c3)}, c6, c7, w0)
  lsatcv1(c0, (0 ` c3), c6, c7, c3, c4, c2, c1, c5, w0)
  eqid((0 ` c3))
  lcvpss(c0, (c6[c4]c7), c2, c3, c5, clvec, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c6[c4]c7)‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà LMod, c6 ‚àà c2, c7 ‚àà c2)
  lsatlssel(c6, c2, c3, c1, w0)
  lsatlssel(c7, c2, c3, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, c3 ‚àà LMod, c3 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c3)
  lsmcl(c3, c6, c2, c7, c4)
}

blocks.name: lsatcvat3
blocks.content: A condition implying that a certain subspace is an atom. Part of Lemma 3.2.20 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 68. ( ~ atcvat3i analog.) (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2015.)

thm lsatcvat3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  lsatcvat2(cin(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), c4, c5, c6, c2, cfv(clcv, c6), c1, c3, w0)

  sseqtrd(co(c0, c2, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c0, c2, c3), co(co(c0, c2, c3), c2, co(c0, c2, c3)), w0)
  eqsstrd(co(c0, c2, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(co(c0, c2, c3), c2, co(c0, c2, c3)), co(co(c0, c2, c3), c2, c1), w0)
  eqtr4d(co(c0, c2, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(co(c0, c2, c3), c2, c1), co(c0, c2, co(c3, c2, c1)), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, c2, co(c1, c2, c3), co(c3, c2, c1), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(c1, c2, c3), co(c3, c2, c1)), wcel(c6, cabl), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, c6)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c6)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, cabl), wcel(c6, clmod))

  lsmass(c0, c6, c3, c1, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, wss(co(co(c0, c2, c3), c2, c1), co(co(c0, c2, c3), c2, co(c0, c2, c3))), wcel(co(c0, c2, c3), cfv(csubg, c6)), wcel(co(c0, c2, c3), cfv(csubg, c6)), wss(c1, co(c0, c2, c3)))
  lsmless2(co(c0, c2, c3), c6, co(c0, c2, c3), c1, c2)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c2, c3), c2, co(c0, c2, c3)), co(c0, c2, c3)), wcel(co(c0, c2, c3), cfv(csubg, c6)))

thm lsatcvat3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÇ(c1[c2]c3))‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(LSubSp ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(LSSum ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSAtoms ` c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà LVec)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚â† c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c3 ‚äÜ c0)

} = {

  eqtr4d((c0[c2](c1[c2]c3)), ((c0[c2]c3)[c2]c1), (c0[c2](c3[c2]c1)), w0)

  syl3anc(w0, (c1[c2]c3)=(c3[c2]c1), c6 ‚àà Abel, c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c6), c3 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c6))
  syl(w0, c6 ‚àà Abel, c6 ‚àà LMod)

  lsmcom(c6, c1, c3, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, ((c0[c2]c3)[c2]c1)=(c0[c2](c3[c2]c1)), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c6), c3 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c6), c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c6))
  lsmass(c0, c6, c3, c1, c2)

  syl3anc(w0, (c0[c2]c3)‚àà c5, c6 ‚àà LMod, c0 ‚àà c5, c3 ‚àà c5)
  lsmcl(c6, c0, c5, c3, c2)

  eqid(cfv(clsa, c5))

  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c0 ‚â† c4))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c0[c3]c4))
  diff.hs0.c((LSAtoms ` c5))
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚àß(c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c0[c3]c4)))
}

blocks.name: l1cvpat
blocks.content: A subspace covered by the set of all vectors, when summed with an atom not under it, equals the set of all vectors. ( ~ 1cvrjat analog.) (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm l1cvpat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clss, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clsm, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clsa, c4))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clcv, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c7, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wss(c2, c0)))
} = {
  mp2d(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wrex(hs0, cdif(c3, csn(cfv(c0g, c4))), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))))), wn(wss(c2, c0)))
  mpbid(w0, wrex(hs0, cdif(c3, csn(cfv(c0g, c4))), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c2, c6))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c2, c6), wrex(hs0, cdif(c3, csn(cfv(c0g, c4))), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c4, clvec))
  islsat(hs0, c4, clvec, c2, c6, c3, cfv(c0g, c4), cfv(clspn, c4))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c4))
  rexlimdv(hs0, cdif(c3, csn(cfv(c0g, c4))), w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), wi(wn(wss(c2, c0)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)))
  syl5(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c3, csn(cfv(c0g, c4)))), wi(wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), wi(wn(wss(c2, c0)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  eldifi(cv(hs0), c3, csn(cfv(c0g, c4)))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), wi(wn(wss(c2, c0)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)))
  mpbird(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))))), wi(wn(wss(c2, c0)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wi(wn(wss(cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))), c0)), wceq(co(c0, c1, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), c3)))
  sylbird(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))))), wn(wss(cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))), c0)), wceq(co(c0, c1, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), c3), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  notbid(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))), c0))
  lspsnel5(cv(hs0), c0, cfv(clspn, c4), c3, c4, c5, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))))))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c4, clmod))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c4, clvec))
  lveclmod(c4)
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, c5))
  biimpd(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(co(c0, c1, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), c3))
  lshpnelb(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cfv(clspn, c4), c3, c4, cfv(clsh, c4), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))))))
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c4))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c4, clvec))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(clsh, c4)))
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(clsh, c4)), wcel(c0, c5), wbr(c0, c7, c3))
  islshpcv(c0, cfv(clsh, c4), c5, c7, c3, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clsh, c4))
  simp2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))))
  3ad2ant3(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), wb(wi(wn(wss(c2, c0)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wi(wn(wss(cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))), c0)), wceq(co(c0, c1, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), c3))))
  imbi12d(wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), wn(wss(c2, c0)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), wn(wss(cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))), c0)), wceq(co(c0, c1, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), c3))
  notbid(wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), wss(c2, c0), wss(cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))), c0))
  sseq1(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))), c0)
  eqeq1d(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, c1, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))))
  oveq2(c2, cfv(cfv(clspn, c4), csn(cv(hs0))), c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(clvec)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(clspn, c4))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wn(wss(c2, c0)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3)))
}

thm l1cvpat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)= c3)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(LSubSp ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(LSSum ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(LSAtoms ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(<oL ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[c7]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c2 ‚äÜ c0)
} = {
  mp2d(w0, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà(c3 \ {(0 ` c4)}), c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })), ¬¨ c2 ‚äÜ c0)
  mpbid(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà(c3 \ {(0 ` c4)}), c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })), c2 ‚àà c6)
  syl(w0, (c2 ‚àà c6 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà(c3 \ {(0 ` c4)}), c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }))), c4 ‚àà LVec)
  islsat(hs0, c4, clvec, c2, c6, c3, (0 ` c4), (LSpan ` c4))
  eqid((0 ` c4))
  rexlimdv(hs0, (c3 \ {(0 ` c4)}), w0, c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }), (¬¨ c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)= c3))
  syl5(w0, hs0 ‚àà(c3 \ {(0 ` c4)}), (c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })‚Üí(¬¨ c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)= c3)), hs0 ‚àà c3)
  eldifi(hs0, c3, {(0 ` c4)})
  3exp(w0, hs0 ‚àà c3, c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }), (¬¨ c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)= c3))
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })), (¬¨ c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)= c3), (¬¨((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })‚äÜ c0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }))= c3))
  sylbird((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })), ¬¨((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })‚äÜ c0, (c0[c1]((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }))= c3, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0)
  notbid((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })), hs0 ‚àà c0, ((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })‚äÜ c0)
  lspsnel5(hs0, c0, (LSpan ` c4), c3, c4, c5, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })))
  3ad2ant1(w0, hs0 ‚àà c3, c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }), c4 ‚àà LMod)
  syl(w0, c4 ‚àà LMod, c4 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c4)
  3ad2ant1(w0, hs0 ‚àà c3, c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }), c0 ‚àà c5)
  biimpd((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })), ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0, (c0[c1]((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }))= c3)
  lshpnelb(hs0, c0, c1, (LSpan ` c4), c3, c4, (LSHyp ` c4), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })))
  eqid((LSpan ` c4))
  3ad2ant1(w0, hs0 ‚àà c3, c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }), c4 ‚àà LVec)
  3ad2ant1(w0, hs0 ‚àà c3, c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }), c0 ‚àà(LSHyp ` c4))
  mpbir2and(w0, c0 ‚àà(LSHyp ` c4), c0 ‚àà c5, c0[c7]c3)
  islshpcv(c0, (LSHyp ` c4), c5, c7, c3, c4, w0)
  eqid((LSHyp ` c4))
  simp2(w0, hs0 ‚àà c3, c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }))
  3ad2ant3(w0, hs0 ‚àà c3, c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }), ((¬¨ c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)= c3)‚Üî(¬¨((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })‚äÜ c0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }))= c3)))
  imbi12d(c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }), ¬¨ c2 ‚äÜ c0, (c0[c1]c2)= c3, ¬¨((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })‚äÜ c0, (c0[c1]((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }))= c3)
  notbid(c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }), c2 ‚äÜ c0, ((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })‚äÜ c0)
  sseq1(c2, ((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }), c0)
  eqeq1d((c0[c1]c2), c3, (c0[c1]((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 })), c2 =((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }))
  oveq2(c2, ((LSpan ` c4)` { hs0 }), c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(clvec)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((0 ` c4))
  diff.hs0.c((LSpan ` c4))

blocks.name: l1cvat
blocks.content: Create an atom under an element covered by the lattice unit. Part of proof of Lemma B in [Crawley] p. 112. ( ~ 1cvrat analog.) (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm l1cvat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cin(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clss, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clsm, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsa, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(clcv, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, c8, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wss(c0, c3)))
} = {
  eqeltrd(cin(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), c4, cin(c3, co(c2, c1, c0)), w0)
  syl6eq(cin(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), cin(c3, co(c2, c1, c0)), cin(co(c2, c1, c0), c3), w0)
  ineq1d(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c2, c1, c0), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c1, c0)), wcel(c6, cabl), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c6)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c6)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, cabl), wcel(c6, clmod))
  lmodabl(c6)
  sseldd(c0, cfv(csubg, c6), c7, w0)
  lsatlssel(c0, c7, c6, c4, w0)
  sseldd(c2, cfv(csubg, c6), c7, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c7, cfv(csubg, c6)), wcel(c6, clmod))
  lsssssubg(c6, c7)
  lsatlssel(c2, c7, c6, c4, w0)
  lsmcom(c6, c0, c2, c1)
  incom(co(c2, c1, c0), c3)
  lsatcvat3(c3, c2, c1, c0, c4, c7, c6, w0)
  necomd(c2, c0, w0)
  sseqtr4d(c2, co(c3, c1, c0), c5, w0)
  lsatssv(c2, c5, c6, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(c6, clvec))
  lveclmod(c6)
  l1cvpat(c3, c1, c0, c5, c6, c7, c4, c8, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm l1cvat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2)‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(LSubSp ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(LSSum ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSAtoms ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c8 =(<oL ` c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚â† c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3[c8]c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c0 ‚äÜ c3)
} = {
  eqeltrd(((c0[c1]c2)‚ãÇ c3), c4, (c3 ‚ãÇ(c2[c1]c0)), w0)
  syl6eq(((c0[c1]c2)‚ãÇ c3), (c3 ‚ãÇ(c2[c1]c0)), ((c2[c1]c0)‚ãÇ c3), w0)
  ineq1d((c0[c1]c2), c3, (c2[c1]c0), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0[c1]c2)=(c2[c1]c0), c6 ‚àà Abel, c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c6), c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c6))
  syl(w0, c6 ‚àà Abel, c6 ‚àà LMod)
  lmodabl(c6)
  sseldd(c0, (SubGrp ` c6), c7, w0)
  lsatlssel(c0, c7, c6, c4, w0)
  sseldd(c2, (SubGrp ` c6), c7, w0)
  syl(w0, c7 ‚äÜ(SubGrp ` c6), c6 ‚àà LMod)
  lsssssubg(c6, c7)
  lsatlssel(c2, c7, c6, c4, w0)
  lsmcom(c6, c0, c2, c1)
  incom((c2[c1]c0), c3)
  lsatcvat3(c3, c2, c1, c0, c4, c7, c6, w0)
  necomd(c2, c0, w0)
  sseqtr4d(c2, (c3[c1]c0), c5, w0)
  lsatssv(c2, c5, c6, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c6 ‚àà LMod, c6 ‚àà LVec)
  lveclmod(c6)
  l1cvpat(c3, c1, c0, c5, c6, c7, c4, c8, w0)
}

blocks.name: lshpat
blocks.content: Create an atom under a hyperplane. Part of proof of Lemma B in [Crawley] p. 112. ( ~ lhpat analog.) TODO: This changes ` U C V ` in ~ l1cvpat and ~ l1cvat to ` U e. H ` , which in turn change ` U e. H ` in ~ islshpcv to ` U C V ` , with a couple of conversions of span to atom. Seems convoluted. Would a direct proof be better? (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lshpat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cin(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clss, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clsm, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clsh, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clsa, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wss(c0, c3)))
} = {
  l1cvat(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cbs, c6), c6, c5, cfv(clcv, c6), w0)
  simpld(w0, wcel(c3, c5), wbr(c3, cfv(clcv, c6), cfv(cbs, c6)))
  simprd(w0, wbr(c3, cfv(clcv, c6), cfv(cbs, c6)), wcel(c3, c5))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(c3, c5), wbr(c3, cfv(clcv, c6), cfv(cbs, c6))), wcel(c3, c7))
  islshpcv(c3, c7, c5, cfv(clcv, c6), cfv(cbs, c6), c6, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c6))
  eqid(cfv(clcv, c6))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lshpat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2)‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(LSubSp ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(LSSum ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(LSHyp ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(LSAtoms ` c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà LVec)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚â† c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c0 ‚äÜ c3)
} = {
  l1cvat(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (Base ` c6), c6, c5, (<oL ` c6), w0)
  simpld(w0, c3 ‚àà c5, c3[(<oL ` c6)](Base ` c6))
  simprd(w0, c3[(<oL ` c6)](Base ` c6), c3 ‚àà c5)
  mpbid(w0, (c3 ‚àà c5 ‚àß c3[(<oL ` c6)](Base ` c6)), c3 ‚àà c7)
  islshpcv(c3, c7, c5, (<oL ` c6), (Base ` c6), c6, w0)
  eqid((Base ` c6))

}
